name: Extinction (itch) (Marlin Media)
description:
Save the dinos from extinction!

Made for Xanderjam 5 in roughly 5-ish days. Platforms! Puzzles! Rage! This game has it all. Jam theme = "Time".

It has been brought to my attention that you might be able to control the bomb with arrow keys. That's NOT intended... so... don't do that :)

Some of the levels can cause a small amount of rage. But don't give up! They're all passable, and there's only 8 of them. Your goal is to get the bomb into the de-fuser before the timer runs out... Hint: throwing while jumping makes the bomb fly a bit further ;)

You'll need to click and drag the clock hand to your option of choice on the title screen, then press space to make a selection.

Controls:

A & D = left & right movement

Space = jump

W & S = up & down when on a ladder

E = pick up & throw bomb

Give it a play and leave a comment/rating so I can reply to your game (if applicable).
